00011 #include <inttypes.h>

00015 /*
00016  * according to the standards below definition should be 256, but we ignored a lot of rules
00017  * including bit stuffing and uart framing, so this is just another one of them
00018  */
00019 #define AX25_MAX_PAYLOAD_LENGTH (UDP_MAX_PAYLOAD_LENGTH+UDP_TOTAL_HEADERS_LENGTH)
00020 #define AX25_TOTAL_HEADERS_LENGTH (18)
00021 
00022 #define AX25_CONTROL_UI_FINAL   0x03
00023 #define AX25_CONTROL_UI_POLL    0x13
00024 #define AX25_PID_NO_PROTOCOL    0xF0
00025 #define AX25_PID_COMPRESSED_TCP 0x06
00026 #define AX25_PID_UNCOMPRESSED_TCP       0x07
00027 
00028 #define AX25_DESTINATION_LENGTH 7
00029 #define AX25_SOURCE_LENGTH 7
00030 #define AX25_CONTROL_LENGTH 1
00031 #define AX25_PID_LENGTH 1
00032 #define AX25_FCS_LENGTH 2
00033 
00034 #define AX25_DESTINATION_OFFSET 0
00035 #define AX25_SOURCE_OFFSET (AX25_DESTINATION_OFFSET+AX25_DESTINATION_LENGTH)
00036 #define AX25_CONTROL_OFFSET (AX25_SOURCE_OFFSET+AX25_SOURCE_LENGTH)
00037 #define AX25_PID_OFFSET (AX25_CONTROL_OFFSET+AX25_CONTROL_LENGTH)
00038 #define AX25_PAYLOAD_OFFSET (AX25_PID_OFFSET+AX25_PID_LENGTH)
00039 #define AX25_FCS_OFFSET(payload_len) (AX25_PAYLOAD_OFFSET+payload_len)
